net.consensys.cava.config

Interface Configuration


  • public interface Configuration
    Represents collection of configuration properties, optionally validated against a schema.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      • toToml

        default void toToml(java.nio.file.Path path)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Save a configuration to a TOML-formatted file.

        If necessary, parent directories for the output file will be created.

        Parameters:
        path - The file path to write the TOML-formatted output to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be written.

     throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
        Check if a key is set in this configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - A configuration key (e.g. "server.address.hostname").
        Returns:
        true if the entry is present in this configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the key cannot be parsed.

      • get

        @Nullable
java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String key)
        Get an object from this configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - A configuration key (e.g. "server.address.hostname").
        Returns:
        The value, or null if no value was set in the configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the key cannot be parsed.

      • inputPositionOf

        @Nullable
DocumentPosition inputPositionOf(java.lang.String key)
        Get the position where a key is defined in the TOML document.
        Parameters:
        key - A configuration key (e.g. "server.address.port").
        Returns:
        The input position, or null if the key was not set in this configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the key cannot be parsed.

      • getString

        java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Get a string from this configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - A configuration key (e.g. "server.address.hostname").
        Returns:
        The value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the key cannot be parsed.
        InvalidConfigurationPropertyTypeException - If the value is not a string.
        NoConfigurationPropertyException - If the key was not set in the configuration.

      • getInteger

        Throws:
